subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: College football is a season of weeks, and when so much attention has been paid to a specific game — like L.S.U. vs. Alabama — it can be difficult for a team to regroup.
snippet: College football is a season of weeks, and when so much attention has been paid to a specific game — like L.S.U. vs. Alabama — it can be difficult for a team to regroup.
